package com.example.selenium_sample

import com.codeborne.selenide.CollectionCondition.sizeGreaterThan
import com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.*
import com.codeborne.selenide.Selenide.*
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
import org.openqa.selenium.By

class GoogleTest {

    @Test
    fun `Search in Google`() {
        open("https://duckduckgo.com")
        `$`(By.name("q")).`val`("selenide java").pressEnter()

        `$$`(".results .result").shouldHave(sizeGreaterThan(1))
        `$`("#r1-0").shouldHave(text("Selenide: concise UI tests in Java"))
    }

}

If holdBrowserOpen is true, browser window stays open after running tests. It may be useful for debugging. Can be configured either programmatically, via selenide.properties file or by system property "-Dselenide.holdBrowserOpen=true". Default value: false.

package com.example.selenium_sample

import com.codeborne.selenide.CollectionCondition.sizeGreaterThan
import com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.*
import com.codeborne.selenide.Configuration
import com.codeborne.selenide.Selenide.*
import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach![ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆ 2022-07-03 22.51.13.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/2433961/8d44122b-27da-a846-03a1-27dba95bd0ae.png)

import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
import org.openqa.selenium.By

class GoogleTest {

    @BeforeEach
    fun `Set Configure Before Test`() {
        Configuration.holdBrowserOpen = true
    }

    @Test
    fun `Search in Google`() {
        open("https://duckduckgo.com")
        `$`(By.name("q")).`val`("selenide java").pressEnter()

        `$$`(".results .result").shouldHave(sizeGreaterThan(1))
        `$`("#r1-0").shouldHave(text("Selenide: concise UI tests in Java"))
    }

}

Which browser to use. Can be configured either programmatically, via selenide.properties file or by system property "-Dselenide.browser=ie". Supported values: "chrome", "firefox", "ie", "opera", "edge" Default value: "chrome"

ã©ã®ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã‚’ã—ã‚ˆã†ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚ã€selenide.propertiesã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚ã€ã¾ãŸJVMå¼•æ•°ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å€¤ã¯chrome/firefox/ie/opera/edgeã§ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã¯chromeã€‚

package com.example.selenium_sample

import com.codeborne.selenide.Browser
import com.codeborne.selenide.Browsers
import com.codeborne.selenide.CollectionCondition.sizeGreaterThan
import com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.*
import com.codeborne.selenide.Configuration
import com.codeborne.selenide.Selenide.*
import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach
import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test
import org.openqa.selenium.By

class GoogleTest {

    @BeforeEach
    fun `Set Configure Before Test`() {
        Configuration.holdBrowserOpen = true
        Configuration.browser = Browsers.SAFARI
    }

    @Test
    fun `Search in Google`() {
        open("https://duckduckgo.com")
        `$`(By.name("q")).`val`("selenide java").pressEnter()

        `$$`(".results .result").shouldHave(sizeGreaterThan(1))
        `$`("#r1-0").shouldHave(text("Selenide: concise UI tests in Java"))
    }

}

Default value: false. ã“ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’trueã«ã—ã¦ãŠãã¨ã€ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆçµ‚äº†å¾Œã‚‚ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã‚’é–‹ã„ãŸã¾ã¾ã«ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ã“ã‚Œã¯ãƒ‡ãƒãƒƒã‚°ã«å½¹ç«‹ã¤ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚ã€`selenide.properties`ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚ã€ã¾ãŸJVMå¼•æ•°ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã¯falseã§ã™ã€‚ #### ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå®Ÿè¡Œå‰ã«ã“ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’trueã«ã—ã¦ãŠã ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã‚’ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ```kotlin:GoogleTest.kt package com.example.selenium_sample import com.codeborne.selenide.CollectionCondition.sizeGreaterThan import com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.* import com.codeborne.selenide.Configuration import com.codeborne.selenide.Selenide.* import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach![ã‚¹ã‚¯ãƒªãƒ¼ãƒ³ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒƒãƒˆ 2022-07-03 22.51.13.png](https://qiita-image-store.s3.ap-northeast-1.amazonaws.com/0/2433961/8d44122b-27da-a846-03a1-27dba95bd0ae.png) import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test import org.openqa.selenium.By class GoogleTest { @BeforeEach fun `Set Configure Before Test`() { Configuration.holdBrowserOpen = true } @Test fun `Search in Google`() { open("https://duckduckgo.com") `$`(By.name("q")).`val`("selenide java").pressEnter() `$$`(".results .result").shouldHave(sizeGreaterThan(1)) `$`("#r1-0").shouldHave(text("Selenide: concise UI tests in Java")) } } ``` ä»Šåº¦ã¯ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ãŒæ¶ˆãˆãšã«æ®‹ã£ã¦ãã‚Œã¾ã—ãŸğŸ‘ ## Chromeä»¥å¤–ã§å‹•ã‹ã—ãŸã„ Chromeä»¥å¤–ã®ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã§ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ã—ãŸã„ã¨ã„ã†ã“ã¨ã‚‚ã‚ã‚‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ãã®ã¨ãã¯ã©ã†ã™ã‚Œã°è‰¯ã„ã§ã—ã‚‡ã†ã‹ã€‚ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‚‚`com.codeborne.selenide.Configuration`ã‚¯ãƒ©ã‚¹ã®ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã‚’è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§å¤‰æ›´ãŒå¯èƒ½ãªã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚`browser`ãƒ—ãƒ­ãƒ‘ãƒ†ã‚£ã«ã¯ä»¥ä¸‹ã®ã‚ˆã†ã«è¨˜è¼‰ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ > Which browser to use. Can be configured either programmatically, via selenide.properties file or by system property "-Dselenide.browser=ie". Supported values: "chrome", "firefox", "ie", "opera", "edge" Default value: "chrome" ã©ã®ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã‚’ã—ã‚ˆã†ã™ã‚‹ã‹ã€ãƒ—ãƒ­ã‚°ãƒ©ãƒ ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚ã€`selenide.properties`ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚ã€ã¾ãŸJVMå¼•æ•°ã‹ã‚‰ã‚‚è¨­å®šã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ãŒã§ãã¾ã™ã€‚ã‚µãƒãƒ¼ãƒˆã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã‚‹å€¤ã¯`chrome`/`firefox`/`ie`/`opera`/`edge`ã§ã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã¯`chrome`ã€‚ ã“ã¡ã‚‰ã‚’safariã«å¤‰æ›´ã—ã¦ã¿ã¾ã™ã€‚å®šæ•°ã‚‚ç”¨æ„ã•ã‚Œã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ ```kotlin:GoogleTest.kt package com.example.selenium_sample import com.codeborne.selenide.Browser import com.codeborne.selenide.Browsers import com.codeborne.selenide.CollectionCondition.sizeGreaterThan import com.codeborne.selenide.Condition.* import com.codeborne.selenide.Configuration import com.codeborne.selenide.Selenide.* import org.junit.jupiter.api.BeforeEach import org.junit.jupiter.api.Test import org.openqa.selenium.By class GoogleTest { @BeforeEach fun `Set Configure Before Test`() { Configuration.holdBrowserOpen = true Configuration.browser = Browsers.SAFARI } @Test fun `Search in Google`() { open("https://duckduckgo.com") `$`(By.name("q")).`val`("selenide java").pressEnter() `$$`(".results .result").shouldHave(sizeGreaterThan(1)) `$`("#r1-0").shouldHave(text("Selenide: concise UI tests in Java")) } } ``` ãŸã ã“ã®ã¾ã¾ã§ã¯å‹•ãã¾ã›ã‚“ã§ã—ãŸã€‚ ```console:console Could not start a new session. Possible causes are invalid address of the remote server or browser start-up failure. ``` #### safariå´ã®è¨­å®š ãƒªãƒ¢ãƒ¼ãƒˆã‚ªãƒ¼ãƒˆãƒ¡ãƒ¼ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ã‚’è¨±å¯ã«ãƒã‚§ãƒƒã‚¯ã‚’å…¥ã‚Œã¾ã™ã€‚ #### å†åº¦ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆå®Ÿè¡Œ safariã®å ´åˆã€ãƒ‡ãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒˆã§webdriverãŒå­˜åœ¨ã™ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã§ã™ã€‚ï¼ˆãƒ‘ã‚¹: `/usr/bin/safaridriver`ï¼‰ã€‚ ä»–ã®ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã‚’ä½¿ç”¨ã™ã‚‹å ´åˆã¯ã€è‡ªåˆ†ã§ãƒ€ã‚¦ãƒ³ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒ‰ã™ã‚‹ç­‰ã®æ‰‹é–“ãŒç™ºç”Ÿã™ã‚‹ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ seleniumã®ã“ã®ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ãŒå‚è€ƒã«ãªã‚Šãã†ã§ã™ã€‚ https://www.selenium.dev/ja/documentation/webdriver/getting_started/install_drivers/ # ã•ã„ã”ã« ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’èµ·å‹•ã™ã‚‹ã ã‘ã§ã—ãŸã‚‰ç°¡å˜ã§ã™ã­ã€‚ãŸã ã€ãƒšãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚ªãƒ–ã‚¸ã‚§ã‚¯ãƒˆç­‰ã‚’ç”¨æ„ã—ã¦ã•ã‚‰ã«ç¶ºéº—ã«ã—ã¦ã„ãã¨ãªã‚‹ã¨æœ€åˆã¯å¤§å¤‰ã‹ã‚‚ã—ã‚Œã¾ã›ã‚“ã€‚ã—ã‹ã—ã€æ‰‹å‹•ã§ãƒ†ã‚¹ãƒˆã‚’ãã‚Šã‹ãˆã™ã‚ˆã‚Šã‹ã¯è‰¯ã„ã®ã§ã¯ãªã„ã‹ã¨æ€ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚
